569:7: kathaṃ ca subhūte acintyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā?
569:8: acintyaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam|
569:9: evaṃ hi subhūte acintyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā|
569:12: na hi cittaṃ vā cetanā vā caitasiko vā atra dharmaḥ pravartate|
569:13: kathaṃ ca subhūte atulyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā?
569:14: na śakyaṃ subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ cintayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā|
569:15: evaṃ hi subhūte atulyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā|
569:16: kathaṃ ca subhūte aprameyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā?
569:17: aprameyaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam|
569:18: evaṃ hi subhūte aprameyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā|
569:19: kathaṃ ca subhūte asaṃkhyeyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā?
569:20: asaṃkhyeyaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam|
569:21: evaṃ hi subhūte asaṃkhyeyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā|
569:22: kathaṃ ca subhūte asamasamakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā?
569:23: nāsti subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya svayaṃbhuvaḥ sarvajñasya samaḥ,
569:25: evaṃ hi subhūte asamasamakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā||
569:31: utāho sarvadharmā apyacintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ?
569:36: evaṃ sarvadharmā api subhūte acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ|
569:39: na tatra cittaṃ na cetanā na caitasikā dharmā na tulanā|
569:42: na tatra cittaṃ na cetanā na caitasikā dharmā na tulanā|
569:44: na tatra cittaṃ na cetanā na caitasikā dharmā na tulanā|
569:54: rūpasya hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate|
569:56: vijñānasya hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate|
569:57: sarvadharmāṇāmapi hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate|
569:58: kena kāraṇena subhūte rūpasya pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate?
569:60: kena kāraṇena subhūte vijñānasya pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate?
569:61: kena kāraṇena subhūte sarvadharmāṇāmapi pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate?
569:62: rūpasya hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na vidyate|
569:64: vijñānasya hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na vidyate|
569:65: sarvadharmāṇāmapi hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na vidyate|
569:66: kena kāraṇena subhūte rūpasya pramāṇaṃ na vidyate?
569:68: kena kāraṇena subhūte vijñānasya pramāṇaṃ na vidyate?
569:69: kena kāreṇena subhūte sarvadharmāṇāmapi pramāṇaṃ na vidyate?
569:81: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api tu astyākāśasya samo vā gaṇanā vā pramāṇaṃ vā tulyaṃ vā cittaṃ vā caitasikā vā dharmāḥ?
569:83: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte anena paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā api acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ|
569:87: evamaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamā iti subhūte samasaṃkhyāpramāṇoparamatvādaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāstathāgatadharmāḥ|
569:88: ākāśasamāsaṃkhyeyāprameyatayā asamasamā asaṃkhyeyā aprameyā ete dharmāḥ|
569:96: asyāṃ khalu punaracintyatāyāmatulyatāyāmaprameyatāyāmasaṃkhyeyatāyāmasamasamatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni,
569:99: viṃśatyā ca bodhisattvairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhābhūt|
569:100: te ca bhagavatā ihaiva bhadrakalpe vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
569:101: ye'pi te upāsakā upāsikāśca yeṣāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham,
569:113: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya janapadasthāmavīryaprāptasya yāni tāni rājakṛtyāni,
569:118: evameva subhūte ye kecidbuddhadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā śrāvakadharmā vā,
569:121: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa mahākṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā rūpasyāparigrahāya anabhiniveśāya|
569:128: subhūtirāha-kathaṃ bhagavan sarvajñatāyā aparigrahāyānabhiniveśāya prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā?
569:129: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvamarhattvaṃ yatra parigrahaṃ vā abhiniveśaṃ vā kuryāḥ?
569:131: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yaṃ parigṛhṇīyāmabhiniveśeyaṃ vā arhattvamiti|
569:134: so'haṃ subhūte tathāgatatvamasamanupaśyan na parigṛhṇāmi nābhiniveśe|
569:137: mā bhagavan navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ parīttakuśalamūlā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsamāpatsyante|
569:138: api tu khalu punarbhagavan ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā hetusaṃpannāḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā dīrgharātrāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyanti,
569:139: ta imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti|
569:141: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvarāśca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan-gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
569:146: te sarve śraddhānusāribhūmau kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā careyuḥ yaśceha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmekadivasamapi kṣāntiṃ rocayedgaveṣeta cintayettulayedupaparīkṣeta upanidhyāyet,
569:148: evamukte bhagavāṃstān kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃśca devaputrānāmantrayāmāsa-yadi devaputrāḥ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇuyāt,
569:150: na tveva teṣāṃ śraddhānusāribhūmau kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā caratām|
569:151: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāśca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan-mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā|
569:152: ityuktvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato'ntikād gamiṣyāma ityārocya prakrāntāḥ|
